summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein, detailing shipping charges and services provided. It includes multiple entries for shipments made by Epstein, with specific dates, charges, and recipients. The invoice highlights various fees, discounts, and service changes effective in April 2001.

events.title: Policy Change
events.description: FedEx announced a change in policy regarding invoice adjustments effective from this date.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated March 19, 2001, and is addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Total charges on the invoice amount to USD $238.42.
Multiple shipments are detailed in the invoice, with various senders and recipients.
The invoice includes a note about a policy change effective April 16, 2001, regarding handling surcharges.
There are several mentions of discounts applied to the total charges.
